Uses of Class
com.n9mtq4.logwindow.listener.ListenerContainer

  • Packages that use ListenerContainer 
    Package Description
    com.n9mtq4.logwindow
    Contains the BaseConsole.
    com.n9mtq4.logwindow.listener
    This package contains classes having to do with listeners that can be added to the BaseConsole
    com.n9mtq4.logwindow.managers
    This package contains managers for StdOut Redirect, Plugin loading, and sockets.

    • Uses of ListenerContainer in com.n9mtq4.logwindow.managers

      Methods in com.n9mtq4.logwindow.managers that return types with arguments of type ListenerContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<ListenerContainer> PluginManager.loadPlugin(java.io.File f, BaseConsole c)
      Loads a plugin from File f into BaseConsole c.
      This plugin being loaded must be in the new format with a plugin.txt in the root of the jar file.
